How the hell do you change the angle of things you want to place on your ship...

I have looked high and low, call me stupid but don't call me late for dinner, but I cannot find it. I know it can be done, I have seen it on some ships I downloaded. But stuffed if I can figure it out...

Help!!!!!
You can use WASD to change 90 degrees and with SHIFT-key change it in 5 degree steps.
Press WASDQE to rotate by 90 degrees, press the same while holding shift to rotate by smaller degrees.

WOW...... I didn't even leave the page, I'm talking to my GF on Skype and decided to refresh and so many replies.....

You guys are awesome. Thanks for the info.
Well that was an easy one
Cool. And you can edit your thread starter to indicate that your question has been answered. :-)
